content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Plate Production Facility at Position (-20.0, -70.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Furnace at position (-20.0, -70.0) for smelting iron ore into iron plates.
- Furnace at position (-18.0, -70.0) actively working with iron ore supply.
- Burner Inserter at position (-20.5, -66.5) waiting for source items.
- BeltGroup connecting furnaces and inserters for efficient material transport.

### Copper Ore Mining Facility at Position (-23.5, -69.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (-23.0, -68.0) extracting copper ore.
- Wooden Chest at position (-23.5, -69.5) storing extracted copper ore.
- Transport Belt network connecting the mining drill to the chest.

### Iron Ore Mining Facility at Position (-14.0, -53.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (-14.0, -53.0) extracting iron ore.
- Wooden Chest at position (-12.5, -54.5) storing extracted iron ore.
- Transport Belt network connecting the mining drill to the chest.

### Miscellaneous Storage and Transport
- Multiple Wooden Chests at various positions for storing coal, iron ore, and iron plates.
- Several BeltGroups facilitating the movement of materials across different facilities.

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when inserting items into furnaces
- Ensure that the inventory contains the items you wish to insert into the furnace. Check your inventory for the required items before attempting to insert.

### Errors when using inserters waiting for source items
- Verify that the source items are available and accessible to the inserter. Adjust the transport belt or source item placement if necessary to ensure the inserter can pick up items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placement. Check for existing entities occupying the target tile.
